entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
